alert.note: Alert for Conway; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Conway, east central Yell and south central Pope Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carden Bottoms, or 10 miles southeast of Russellville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atkins... Pottsville... Oppelo... Petit Jean State Park... Carden Bottoms... Galla Creek WMA... Ada... Lakeview in Yell County... Holla Bend... Pontoon... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
